definition.text: Most of the action happens on an HTML 5 Canvas animation. The rest is pure HTML + CSS, nothing else.

paragraphs.text: The main object of the Canvas App is called canvas. It is essentially a collection of different space objects:
Charting Space: Where charts are displayed,
Design Space: Where definitions are maintained.
Side Space: Currently, the workspace selector.
Tutorial Space: Enables tutorials like this one.
Panel Space: Where plotter panels live.
Top Space: Currently, the top bar with logo.
